frame.name: Fire_break
frame.definition:
<def-root>This frame pertains to <fen>Fire_break</fen>s, entities intended to prevent a fire from traveling in a direction. They are constructed by removing combustible/flammable material from the predicted path of the flames.
<ex>The firefighters created several <t>fire breaks</t> at the outskirts of the wildlife sanctuary to prevent fires from reaching the precious "inner sanctum". </ex></def-root>

FE.name: Fire_break
FE.definition:
<def-root>The constructed entity that is intended to prevent a fire from reaching a protected area.
<ex>The firefighters' <fex name="Fire_break">fire break</fex> directly outside of the schoolyard fence prevented the field from going up in flames.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Creator
FE.definition: <def-root>An individual or individuals that bring the <fen>Fire_break</fen> into existence. </def-root>

FE.name: Material
FE.definition: <def-root>Any indication of what makes up the <fen>Fire_break</fen>, including components, ingredients, etc.</def-root>

FE.name: Name
FE.definition: <def-root>The term used to refer to a <fen>Fire_break</fen>.</def-root>

FE.name: Time_of_creation
FE.definition:
<def-root>The time at which a <fen>Fire_break</fen> comes into existence.
</def-root>
